definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: The Chinese players are busy getting ready for the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 我國體育健兒正忙於備戰2008年北京奧運會。

sentences.english: With abundant rivers and lakes, China boasts many good swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 中國的河流湖泊星羅棋佈，游泳健兒輩出。

sentences.english: The athletes refuel, the Chinese Olympic Games young hero refuels.
sentences.chinese: 運動員們加油，中國奧運健兒加油。

sentences.english: I wish all the athletes the best of luck in their competitions.
sentences.chinese: 我預祝各參賽健兒在運動會能夠取得佳績。

sentences.english: The tireless -pursuit spirit of Olympic athletes has set a model for each of us.
sentences.chinese: 奧運健兒不懈的追求給我們每一個人樹立了一道豐碑。

sentences.english: They sang the heroically "Song of Sportsmen of Wintertime Swimming", plunging into the ice-cold water.
sentences.chinese: 他們唱着“冬泳健兒之歌”撲向冰冷的江水。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Gordon Brown was among those welcoming home the country's olympic stars.
sentences.chinese: 英國首相布朗也歡迎英國的奧林匹克健兒們凱旋歸來。

sentences.english: A whole gang of straps came in the bar and ordered milk.
sentences.chinese: 一大羣體育健兒走進了酒吧店，並要了牛奶。

sentences.english: The sports masters have won our country honour in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 運動健兒在奧運會上爲國爭了光。
